name: Konditorei Bäckerei Kostner
description: Far known beyond the borders of Mayrhofen, our KOSTNER family business with quality products from coffee, confectionery, pastry, bakery, organic bakery and the cozy "La Dolce Vita Apartments" for sensual moments and enjoyable highlights. Healthy Fresh quality - with a unique, creative twist - is all about the heart of our KOSTNER baking workshop.
